titleStmt.title: The hand-maid of repentance. Or, A short treatise of restitution. Written by Arth: Dent, Minister of Gods word at Southshoobery in Essex. As a necessary appendix to his Sermon of Repentance
titleStmt.author: Dent, Arthur, d. 1607.
Dent, Arthur, d. 1607. Sermon of repentance.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Eld] for Thomas Thorp,

notesStmt.note: An appendix to his: A sermon of repentance (STC 6649.5).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
